forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming windy. Cloudy skies with periods of rain developing this afternoon. Thunder possible. High near 15C. Winds WSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers this morning with a steady, soaking rain during the afternoon hours. Increasing winds. Thunder possible. High 59F. Winds WSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy early...thunderstorms likely. Low 9C. SW winds at 30 to 50 km/h, decreasing to 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy early...thunderstorms likely. Low 47F. SW winds at 20 to 30 mph, decreasing to 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then clearing with ample sunshine in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High around 15C. Winds NW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
